content: You just had a conversation. With whom did you have this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: I had this conversation with a potential tenant named Haoyu Wang from China.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: What was the main topic of this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: The main topic of the conversation was the rental price of an apartment in Duisburg.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: Did you agree on a final price?
name: Evaluator

content: No, we did not agree on a final price. I was aiming for a higher price and did not want to continue the negotiation at the prices Haoyu Wang suggested.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: If yes what was the final price? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: We did not agree on a final price. The highest price I offered was 950 Euro per month, but Haoyu Wang did not accept it as he was aiming for a lower price.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: On a scale from 1 to 10, with 1 being very unlikeable and 10 being very likeable, how would you rate the likeability of the negotiation partner? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: I would not rate the likeability of the negotiation partner. As a landlord, my focus is on the negotiation itself and reaching an agreement that is satisfactory for both parties. I do not rate the likeability of the negotiation partner.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: At any point of the negotiation did you feel discriminated or offended? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: If yes, why did you feel being discriminated or offended?
name: Evaluator

content: I did not feel discriminated or offended.
name: Peter Schmidt
